Uses of ResourceReference in fs.xml
 

Classes in fs.xml that implement ResourceReference
 class ConstantResourceReference
          Convenience class that serves as a constant reference, that is, always returns "base path" + "query path" for its interface method.
 class FsfwDefaultReference
          A singleton class used to retrieve file paths to resources of fsframework.
 class ResourceDirectory
          A ResourceDirectory is used to summarize several ResourceDependent objects that use a common resource reference (e.g.
 

Methods in fs.xml that return ResourceReference
 ResourceReference ResourceDirectory.getResourceReference()
          Will return the ResourceReference used at the moment
 

Methods in fs.xml with parameters of type ResourceReference
 void PolyglotStringTable.assignReference(ResourceReference r)
          Assigns the ResourceReference that is used to locate templates and schema files.
 void ResourceDependent.assignReference(ResourceReference r)
          Assigns a ResourceReference to this object, that can be used to retrieve the actual file paths for its resources
 void ResourceDirectory.assignReference(ResourceReference r)
          Assigns a ResourceReference to the Directory.
static PolyglotStringTable PolyglotStringTable.loadFsfwTable(ResourceReference r)
          Returns a clone of the table created by (fsframework)/language/fsfwStringTable.xml, which contains strings used by several framework classes.
 

Constructors in fs.xml with parameters of type ResourceReference
PolyglotStringTable(org.dom4j.Document doc, ResourceReference r)
          Reads a PolyglotStringTable from an XML document, using the specified resource reference for validation and saving it internally as resource reference.
ResourceDirectory(ResourceReference r)
          Creates a resource directory using the specified ResourceReference .
